component.text: Configure Fully Specified Static IPv6 Routes on R1
Configure a Fully Specified Static IPv6 Route on R2

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command.***
component.existingcommands: Configure a fully specified static IPv6 route to the R1 LAN using the R1 link-local address as the next-hop address.

command.instruction: Exit configuration mode and display the IPv6 routing table.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Table - default - 9 entries
Codes: C - Connected, L - Local, S - Static, U - Per-user Static route
B - BGP, R - RIP, I1 - ISIS L1, I2 - ISIS L2
IA - ISIS interarea, IS - ISIS summary, D - EIGRP, EX - EIGRP external
ND - ND Default, NDp - ND Prefix, DCE - Destination, NDr - Redirect
O - OSPF Intra, OI - OSPF Inter, OE1 - OSPF ext 1, OE2 - OSPF ext 2
ON1 - OSPF NSSA ext 1, ON2 - OSPF NSSA ext 2
S 2001:DB8:ACAD:1::/64 [1/0]
via FE80::1, Serial0/0/0
<output omitted>
R2#
command.instruction: You successfully configured a fully specified static IPv6 route on R2.
